action: Tap 'Close button to dismiss language selection overlay'
observation: I can see there's a language selection overlay that has appeared on the page, and I notice there are multiple language options available. I can see English is at the top of the list. As an elderly user, I want to keep things simple and proceed with English. The close button (element 23) is visible in the top right corner of the overlay. I should close this language overlay to get back to the main signup form.
reasoning: As a 70-year-old user, I need to dismiss this language overlay that's blocking my view of the main signup form. I can see the close button (X) clearly in the top right corner. I want to continue with English which is already selected, so I'll close this overlay to proceed with the email signup.
